author: stylesen
msg: * STATUS: Cast my vote for r38410.

author: hwright
msg: Don't require an access baton for entries_write().  Although we still retrieve
one internally, that's not reason the API has to have the access baton.
(entries_write): Remove access baton, and replace with the standard db/abspath
parameter pair.  We retrieve an access baton internally so that we can
check our writability and flush the cache. Remove a subpool.

author: hwright
msg: Switch a couple of baton opens to use the shared wc context.

author: hwright
msg: Fix serious bugs in libsvn_ra_svn and svnsync.  (If svnsync errors
while syncing from svnserve to mod_dav_svn, it commits a
half-written transaction rather than aborting it.)
A potentially large audience of users may unknowingly be creating

author: hwright
msg: Merge r38290, r38293, r38294 from trunk:
AP_SERVER_MINORVERSION_NUMBER does not exist in earlier versions.
But AP_SERVER_MINORVERSION (which is a string) does exist, so use that.
Some people are stuck with older versions of things.
